body.name: Bestier Small L Shaped Desk with Charging Port & LED Strip,Modern Computer Desk with Reversible Storage Shelves,Corner Desk with Hooks for Bedroom Office Studio Workstation,Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 28 mins
features: MULTIFUNCTIONAL COMPUTER DESK - Bestier Small l shaped gaming desk with LED strip provides 7 colors and 20 modes, you can switch the light color at will according to your mood and usage scenario. Life needs a sense of ritual, colorful lights make your life relax and fun. In addition, the table is built in 4 AC ports and 2 USB charging ports, they provide additional power support for your phone, computer, tablet and other electronic devices.

MODERN CORNER DESK - This computer desk has a main tabletop and adds a headphone hooks to the regular worktop. There is also a removable computer stand, you can install the stand on the desktop or side shelf according to your usage. The spacious desktop and thoughtful design can help you better allocate desktop space and say goodbye to the cluttered desktop.

FLEXIBLE HOME WORKSTATION - The L shaped corner design maximizes the use of limited space, and the double storage shelves on the side can be placed on either side according to your usage habits and space planning. Compact while providing ample storage space, perfect for small space apartments or dormitories.

HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS - This Bestier study table is made of high-grade smooth MDF and thickened steel frame with stable structure and good weight-bearing capacity, so you don't have to worry at all in terms of service life. The table legs all come with non-slip foot pads that can adapt to a variety of different floors while avoiding scratching the floor.

DIMENSION & EASY ASSEMBLY - The overall dimensions of this computer desk are: 42 "W x 31.5 "L x 36 "H. We provide the tools needed for installation and clear and concise installation instructions, so people with no installation experience will be able to install this desk in no time. If there is any problem with the product, we offer exchange and return service. Please feel free to contact us!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Can the L shape be installed on the other side? Yes, This L-shaped side can be installed on both sides of the table freely according to your personal preference and room layout. How long will it take to complete the assembly? We have provided clear assembly videos and instructions, and it takes about 35-45 minutes for high school and above to complete the installation independently. How much weight can the iron mesh panels on the side support? In the instructions it does show the panels be capable of 25lb load. And.. this is something we suggest for u that flat panel (<30lb) is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well engineered product
reviews.reviewText: Very versatile, easy to adapt to your personal needs. Reasonably easy to assemble. Read and understand instructions first. I myself am a Metal fabricator; this is extremely well designed and well worth the cost. Also easy to add to for your own needs. I added a pull out keyboard shelf from my old desk. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughter loves it! ❤️Perfect for school work, gaming!
reviews.reviewText: Great desk. Perfect size for school work, gaming, etc. Fun pink color. Fits nicely in the corner of her room. Easily assembled. Reasonably priced. Received quickly. Very heavy duty, durable and well made! Great choice! 👍👏🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little desk
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our son who has very little room and it fit perfectly. Everything was numbered and instructions were very easy to follow. Very durable and perfect for all his gaming/school needs. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Space saving, sturdy, well-made at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: Very well made for the price. Love the wood grain color, and very easy to follow directions. I put together myself under two hours. They provide every tool you need. Fits perfectly in my corner space. Only wish the L shape part extended a couple inches more. But I have ample workspace for my laptop and computer monitor. And I loveee the built in outlets, that is what initially sold me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Nice quality. Works great in a small space. Looks great in my son’s room. Power strip is a great addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice desk for the price
reviews.reviewText: This was perfect for my son's room. It was not to hard to get out together and once together very sturdy. Fast shipping was great. I would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, getting my money's worth
reviews.reviewText: My computer fits perfectly in the shelf below the small section, it's convenient having the little table on it. If I needed two desks I would purchase this one again. A bit tough to assemble but the instructions are clear; my knees are just a bit older than I feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We purchase this task for our son who Is into gaming this is perfect. It’s not too large and the material that it’s made of is very durable. I can see it lasting for a long time. It has lights that go Under the desk, which is also a neat feature I highly recommend this
El escritorio no es muy grande, verifica bien las medidas, en mi caso lo hice y era alo que necesitaba, se siente de buena calidad, fácil de armar incluye herramientas y manual de ensamble

Acquistata per mia figlia, facile da montare, si può scegliere come montarla, mia figlia si trova molto bene con questa scrivania è praticamente inseparabile, ci studia e ci gioca e ci mangia pure.Consiglio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent Desk with Secure Packaging and Easy Assembly!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Bestier L Shaped Desk, and I must say I am thoroughly impressed with the entire experience, from the moment it arrived to the final assembly.Firstly, the packaging was incredibly secure and well thought out. The desk arrived without a single scratch or dent, thanks to the careful packaging. It's evident that the manufacturer took great care to ensure the product reaches its destination in perfect condition.Assembly was a breeze, and much of the credit goes to the clear and easy-to-understand instructions provided. The step-by-step guide made it simple to put together, and I was able to have the desk ready in no time. The pre-drilled holes lined up perfectly, making the entire process smooth and frustration-free.Once assembled, the desk proved to be exceptionally sturdy and of high quality. Every component felt robust and well-made, instilling confidence in its durability. What impressed me even more was the attention to detail, extending to the tools that came with the desk. The included tools were of high quality and made the assembly process even more enjoyable.The design of the L-shaped desk is not only functional but also aesthetically pleasing. It provides ample workspace and fits seamlessly into my home office. The materials used in construction are of top-notch quality, and it's clear that this desk is built to last.In conclusion, the Bestier L Shaped Desk exceeded my expectations. From secure packaging to easy assembly and impressive sturdiness, it's a fantastic addition to any workspace. If you're in the market for a high-quality desk that combines durability with a sleek design, look no further. Highly recommended!

El producto es perfecto, tal y como pone la página.Lo armamos entre 2 personas y sin problemas (incluso una sola lo puede montar).Las instrucciones son muy claras y viene con todo lo necesario (incluidos destornilladores).
El producto venia con piezas faltantes para la instalacion.. no recomendable
